text: Friends, I have some very good news. We have a substantial update to CTAs ready for testing that brings retina support to image CTAs and we'd love some help testing it.
If you'd like to try it out and provide feedback, DM me your Hub ID and we'll make it happen :muscle:
looks like they are being passed through as og:description, rather than meta name="description"

Minor but annoying bug report: Rich text fields if you have a heading then a paragraph of text, if you select both the heading and paragraph then change alignment it turns the heading into paragraph text.

It’s a minor annoyance and the bug has been there for a very long time. but thought I’d report it anyway
Yeah, that’s always been how the rich text module handles things. Just give a quick `cmd + \` and it will clear formatting.
